title: Need help to fix challenge in 3a 4 nt hving enough storage to click pics & videos and install apps
content:
Need help to fix challenge of getting constant error of "not enough storage, pls delete backed up videos &  pics and other  apps to create required space. Also, device always showing "full storage used" and thereby not performing any function starting from clicking  and saving any pic or videos to calling anyone or applying chat option with Google even. Thing is  in order to create enough storage space  I' vre already deleted backed up videos and pics and as of now  didn't click any new videos or pics via it and install ed only two software.  So at present, there is no pic or videos on it.

Therefore would request you to please help me in creating  enough storage for clicking unlimited videos, pics via it and 
on it and installing new required apps.
